0a39f78bcb297ab0ebe8a29c28bfed89 (19:07): Title: {agenda} HTML WG telecon 2011-06-09 Action Items, New Calls, TF Reports, Revert Request from Sam Ruby on 2011-06-07 (<email/> from April to June 2011) (at lists.w3.org)
17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (19:07): On the phone I see 60659cfda992013e610f285c46692d28, [Microsoft], 07e5fbfbff4a4dc12ff1de86591c195d, Cynthia_Shelly, Sam, Radhika_Roy, Plh, [Microsoft.a]
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (19:08): ACTION-203 -- Steve Faulkner to develop a usable LC comment form -- due 2011-06-09 -- OPEN
0a39f78bcb297ab0ebe8a29c28bfed89 (19:08): Title: ACTION-203: Develop a usable LC comment form - HTML Weekly Tracker (at www.w3.org)
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:09): Sam: there are people working on this, with Mike and Steve
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:09): ... recommendation is to close the item since we don't have a firm date
c9c6a1cb7041dd2dff94812f510d6149 (19:09): zakim, who is on the phone?

17f9b78129866dff3cbd228a8d985fbf (19:09): On the phone I see 60659cfda992013e610f285c46692d28, [Microsoft], 07e5fbfbff4a4dc12ff1de86591c195d, Cynthia_Shelly, Sam, Radhika_Roy, Plh, 80e10fafc1d1d43d9e807898cc470ca8
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (19:09): ACTION-203 Develop a usable LC comment form closed
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:10): Sam: we have a call for Consensus: publish HTML5 Edition for Web Authors as a FPWD
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:10): ... we have some objections that we need to work through
22813b6f9b851d152e2f2d99116de592 (19:11): ISSUE-151 -- Remove WhatWG and html5.org references in status section of document -- open
0a39f78bcb297ab0ebe8a29c28bfed89 (19:11): Title: ISSUE-151: Remove WhatWG and html5.org references in status section of document - HTML Weekly Tracker (at www.w3.org)
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:11): ... we already received one additional proposal
0a39f78bcb297ab0ebe8a29c28bfed89 (19:11): Title: ISSUE-165: Drop rel=pingback - HTML Weekly Tracker (at www.w3.org)
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:11): sam: this closes by July 8 as well
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:11): sam: and finally the call for consensus previously discussed
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:12): Kris: met last week as planned.
0a39f78bcb297ab0ebe8a29c28bfed89 (19:12): Title: RE: HTML Testing Task Force Conf Call Agenda 5/31/2011 from Kris Krueger on 2011-06-09 (<email/> from June 2011) (at lists.w3.org)
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:13): Kris: don't have new bugs on tests
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:13): ... also discussion on release of test suite. using a branch or tag. we'll use tags
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:13): ... we also approved the reflection tests
0a39f78bcb297ab0ebe8a29c28bfed89 (19:13): Title: HTML5 reflection tests: metadata elements (at w3c-test.org)
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:14): ... also some discussion on infrastructure stuff but not related to the html wg specifically
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:14): Janina: lots of efforts to organize a very thorough read of HTML5 LC
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:14): ... reaching beyond our immediate circle of individuals
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:15): ... putting a bit of effort into organizing that
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:15): ... we have a wiki page on it
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:15): ... the canvas group is on hold while Rich is on vacation. back next week
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:15): ... making progress on a few last issues
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:15): ... how to handle any kind of text based video descriptions
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:16): ... video descriptions go in the section of the video with no dialog, along may need to pause/resume the video
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:16): ... not sure about the impact on the spec
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:16): ... looks it will affect the API
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:17): ... we'd like a consistent way of referring to those things
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:17): ... seems like w3c doesn't do urns
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:17): ... some action items from yesterday on that front
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:18): Sam: we had a revert request, which has been applied
8d5c0dd1af8dbfd69120fd4882cb3a68 (19:19): Sam: I believe it will be Maciej's turn to chair
